homepage.meta.description.message: Shira builds your team's ability to identify and defeat phishing attacks.

homepage.meta.longDescription.message: Shira helps individuals and organizations learn to spot and defeat phishing attacks through interactive, privacy-friendly quizzes, customizable for real-world apps like Gmail, SMS, and WhatsApp, context and language.

homepage.hero.subtitle.message: Shira builds your team's ability to identify and defeat phishing attacks

homepage.learners.description.message: Get started right away with one of our free, ready-made quizzes. Customize the quiz to learn to identify phishing in the apps you use in real life — Gmail, SMS, WhatsApp, etc — with examples tailored to your language and field of work.

homepage.educators.description.message: Each organization has its own needs and faces its own threats. Build phishing quizzes tailored to your organization’s needs and monitor your team’s success rates — all without technical skills.

homepage.context.description.message: For years, phishing has been one of the most common types of attacks facing individuals and organizations. While it has been traditionally limited to emails, phishing now also happens via SMS, messaging apps, and social media. Building users’ skills to identify and defeat phishing attacks is more needed than ever before.

homepage.context.imageAlt.message: decorative image of a magnifier glass

homepage.why.intro.message: Whether you’re just taking our ready-made, free quizzes, or you’re taking the time to build your own custom quizzes, Shira is:

homepage.why.easy.description.message: Created for communities most at risk of phishing attacks, even with limited tech literacy.

homepage.why.customizable.description.message: Realistic phishing messages to simulate real scenarios users face daily.

homepage.why.privacy.description.message: We do not collect or share any user data.

about.meta.description.message: Learn about Shira and the team behind it — a project by Horizontal, a non-profit creating security and privacy tools that help individuals and organizations defend against phishing attacks.

about.meta.longDescription.message: Learn about Shira and the team behind it — a project by Horizontal, a non-profit creating security and privacy tools that help individuals and organizations defend against phishing attacks.

about.hero.subtitle.message: Helping individuals and organizations to build their defense against phishing attacks

about.hero.imageAlt.message: shira logo: it is an S in blue and light green colors

about.horizontal.description.message: Shira is a project by Horizontal, a technology non-profit that builds security and privacy technology to help people be safer online.

about.horizontal.donationText.message: You can help us improve and sustain Shira by

about.horizontal.translationText.message: To contribute to the translation of Shira into new languages, email us at

about.why.easy.description.message: Shira was created considering communities that are the most at-risk of phishing attacks, especially users with limited tech literacy.

about.why.customizable.description.message: We try to make phishing messages look as realistic as possible, to simulate what internet users actually face in their daily lives and the phishing attacks they are likely to face.

about.why.privacy.description.message: We do not collect, save, or share any data about users visiting Shira or taking quizzes. To learn more, check out our privacy policy and a recent security audit performed by an independent security firm.

about.how.opensource.message: Shira is Open Source, and licencesed under MIT 2.0.

about.how.design.message: At Horizontal, we design and develop centering the needs of the community.

about.how.community.message: Shira is multilingual, co-created with users and centering security and privacy.

about.how.green.message: This website runs on green energy.

about.how.greenAlt.message: This website runs on green hosting - verified by thegreenwebfoundation.org
